submission.title: Enhancing Whistleblower Protection within the Meta-Layer
submission.overview: This submission draws upon established frameworks from WPAC (2015) and Security.org to propose enhancements to whistleblower systems in alignment with the Meta-Layer's Desirable Properties. It emphasizes secure, anonymized federated authentication, user-controlled data sovereignty, interoperable and simplified reporting interfaces, and system-wide transparency and security protocols. These systems are essential to protect whistleblowers from retaliation and to ensure credibility, participation, and systemic accountability. This submission was generated with protocol META-DP-EVAL-v1.3.

directly_addressed_dps.summary: Supports secure, anonymous access through decentralized ID while maintaining accountability.
Proposes whistleblower-controlled data and encrypted, decentralized storage.
Recommends standardized open protocols for reporting and data handling.
Calls for transparent case updates and anonymized reporting to build trust.
Proposes blockchain-based timestamping and digital signatures to secure reports.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Enhancing Whistleblower Protections
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Implementing federated authentication can authenticate users without revealing identities using decentralized identity solutions.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Balancing accountability with anonymity encourages whistleblowing while deterring fraud.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Empowering Whistleblowers through Data Control
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Platforms should allow whistleblowers to manage, delete, or anonymize data, with end-to-end encryption and decentralized storage.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Data sovereignty increases trust and compliance, encouraging more disclosures.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Streamlining Reporting Mechanisms
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Standardized interfaces simplify whistleblower submissions across systems.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Ease of use reduces barriers to participation and improves processing efficiency.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Building Confidence in Whistleblower Systems
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Provide submission updates and publish anonymized outcome data to show system effectiveness.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Visible accountability reassures users that reports lead to meaningful action.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Ensuring Integrity of Whistleblower Reports
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Use digital signatures and blockchain-based timestamping to verify authenticity.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Securing report integrity is essential for legal and investigative follow-up.
